commands.name: az eventhubs namespace identity assign
commands.summary: Assign System or User or System,User assigned identities to a namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace identity assign --namespace-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                                       [--user-assigned]
examples: az eventhubs namespace identity assign --namespace-name mynamespace -g MyResourceGroup --system-assigned --user-assigned /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}}/resourceGroups/{resourcegroup}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/MSIName /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}}/resourceGroups/{resourcegroup}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/MSIName2

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace identity remove
commands.summary: Remove System or User or System,User assigned identities from a namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace identity remove --namespace-name
                                       --resource-group
                                       [--system-assigned {false, true}]
                                       [--user-assigned]
examples: az eventhubs namespace identity remove --namespace-name mynamespace -g MyResourceGroup --system-assigned --user-assigned /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}}/resourceGroups/{resourcegroup}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/MSIName
